tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE audio_waveform_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    audio_data BYTEA,
    sample_rate INT,
    channel_count INT,
    duration FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE SpeakerSpeech (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    speaker_id INT,
    audio_file_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (speaker_id) REFERENCES Speakers(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (audio_file_id) REFERENCES AudioFiles(id)
);
